project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis, specifically calculating the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns in a CSV file specified by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to read a CSV file and identify numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate the mean for specified numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate the median for specified numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate the mode for specified numerical columns
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
